name: MuJS
description: MuJS: An ECMAScript compiler for Mu
author: Joe Duffy (joeduffy@acm.org)

scripts.build: tsc && tslint cmd/*.ts cmd/**/*.ts lib/*.ts lib/**/*.ts tests/*.ts tests/**/*.ts && npm run copytestdata
scripts.test: npm run cov && npm run covreport
scripts.covreport: istanbul report text-summary && istanbul report text
